summary: STARTING ABOUT 6 MONTHS AGO VEHICLE BEGAN SHOWING SIGNS OR PROBLEMS DESCRIBED IN T-SB-0140-10 TITLED STEERING ON-CENTER FEEL. VEHICLE IS NEAR IMPOSSIBLE TO STAY IN A STRAIGHT PATH OVER SPEEDS OF 30-40 MPH. VEHICLE IS LONG SINCE PAST, WARRANTY, 2010 TOYOTA COROLLA W/>106K. ORIGINAL TSB DATED JUNE 3, 2010 INSTRUCTED THAT TOYOTA WOULD REPAIR WITHOUT CHARGE BY REPLACING COMPUTER ASSEMBLY, POWER STEERING IF STILL UNDER WARRANTY, HAVE COME ACROSS NUMEROUS COMPLAINTS AND FEEL THERE SHOULD BE FURTHER INVESTIGATION TO INSTITUTE A FULL SAFETY RECALL FOR THIS MAKE AND MODEL.
